name: Fetters of Dromi
description: @{attribute}{Relic} equipment associated with the @{ability}{Major Crest of Aubin||Minor Crest of Aubin}{Crest of Aubin} and the abilities @{ability}{Aegis} and @{ability}{Pavise}. Grants wielder movement +1 and @{ability}{Canto}.
comment: Items in modifers can either be integers or string expressions
